description: This procurement has been set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). In order to be considered, a supplier must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business as defined under PSIB and that it will comply with all requirements of PSIB.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Procurement Title

**English:** ISED210585 - Storage Lockers
**French:** IAS ISED210585 - Casiers de Rangement

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-720-66001488
* **Solicitation Number:** ISED210585
* **Publication Date:** June 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 10, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 1, 2024
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents

### Location

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa

### Contact Information

* **Contract Authority:** Jordan Kearns
* **Email:** Jordan.Kearns@ised-isde.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 548-6416
* **Location:** 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5, Canada

### Tender Documents

* Please refer to the Canada Buys website for additional information:
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40551/rfb-ised210585---storage-lockers.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40551/lockers-technical-drawings-_-casiers-dessins-techniques.pdf

### Special Consideration

This procurement is subject to the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be eligible, suppliers must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business and comply with all requirements of the PSIB. Suppliers are expected to ensure they meet all requirements outlined in the tender documents.  Ontario Ontario Toronto . ontari o.
